StartCityCode.description: The IATA airport code for the starting address for the booking.

EndCityCode.description: The IATA airport code for the end city of the booking.

BaseFare.description: The base fare of the airfare quote.

TotalFare.description: The total price of the booking.

IsRefundable.description: If true, the fare is refundable.

FareBasisCode.description: An alphabetic or alpha-numeric code used by airlines to identify a fare type and allow airline staff and travel agents to find the rules applicable to that fare.

ClassOfService.description: Class of fare for the ticket.

GsaYcaFare.description: Fare for GSA Unrestricted Coach Fare

GsaXcaFare.description: Fare for a GSA Capacity-Controlled Fare

GsaXcbFare.description: Fare for a GSA Business Class Fare
